definition.name: Accordion
definition.purpose: Provides a collapsible container for grouping content into expandable/collapsible sections.
definition.description: A reusable accordion component built on top of Radix UI's AccordionPrimitive.Root. It renders a container for accordion items, allowing users to expand and collapse sections. Accepts all props supported by Radix Accordion Root.

initial.data: Accordion with no items expanded by default.

when.description: A user clicks on an accordion trigger.

effects: The corresponding accordion content is shown.

when.description: A user clicks on an expanded accordion trigger.

effects: The corresponding accordion content is hidden.

definition.visualLayout: Vertical stack of collapsible sections, each with a header and content area.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix AccordionPrimitive.Root and passes all props through.

definition.name: AccordionItem
definition.purpose: Represents a single item/section within an accordion.
definition.description: A reusable accordion item component built on top of Radix UI's AccordionPrimitive.Item. It renders a section within the accordion, typically containing a trigger and content. Accepts all props supported by Radix Accordion Item.

when.description: A user clicks the trigger for this item.

effects: The content for this item is shown.

when.description: A user clicks the trigger for this item when expanded.

effects: The content for this item is hidden.

definition.visualLayout: A bordered section within the accordion, with a header and collapsible content area.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix AccordionPrimitive.Item and applies border styling. Passes all props through.

definition.name: AccordionTrigger
definition.purpose: Acts as the clickable header for an accordion item, toggling its expanded/collapsed state.
definition.description: A reusable trigger component for accordion items, built on top of Radix UI's AccordionPrimitive.Trigger. It displays the item header and a chevron icon, and toggles the visibility of the associated content when clicked. Accepts all props supported by Radix Accordion Trigger.

initial.data: Accordion item header with chevron icon.

when.description: A user clicks the trigger when expanded.

definition.visualLayout: A flex row with the item label and a chevron icon indicating expansion state.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix AccordionPrimitive.Trigger and includes a ChevronDownIcon. Applies transition and accessibility styles.

definition.name: AccordionContent
definition.purpose: Displays the collapsible content area for an accordion item.
definition.description: A reusable content component for accordion items, built on top of Radix UI's AccordionPrimitive.Content. It renders the content area that is shown or hidden based on the item's expanded state. Accepts all props supported by Radix Accordion Content.

visible: Accordion content area (hidden or shown depending on state)

when.description: The associated trigger is activated to expand the item.
The associated trigger is activated to collapse the item.

definition.visualLayout: A collapsible content area below the accordion item header, with padding and animation.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix AccordionPrimitive.Content and applies animation and padding styles.
